mapper.select: SELECT 'ARR'||'-'||TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||'-'||NVL(LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(ACCESSION_NO),14)) + 1,3,'0'),'001') as accessionNo FROM IG_ACCESSION_RECORD WHERE ACCESSION_NO LIKE '%' || TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || '%'

SELECT ACCESSION_RECORD_UUID as accessionRecordUuid, ACCESSION_NO as accessionNo, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ACQUISITION_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') as acquisitionDate, ACQUISITION_SOURCE as acquisitionSource, ACQUISITION_TYPE_UUID as acquisitionTypeUuid, DESCRIPTION as description, NOTES as notes, TITLE as title, as insertUuid, INSERT_DATE as insertDate, as updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM IG_ACCESSION_RECORD WHERE ACCESSION_RECORD_UUID = #{accessionRecordUuid}

SELECT ACCESSION_RECORD_UUID as accessionRecordUuid, ACCESSION_RECORD_ETC_UUID as accessionRecordEtcUuid, TYPE_UUID as typeUuid, AUTHORITY_UUID as authorityUuid, NAME as name, TEL as tel, ADDRESS as address, as insertUuid, INSERT_DATE as insertDate, as updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM IG_ACCESSION_RECORD_DETAIL WHERE ACCESSION_RECORD_UUID = #{accessionRecordUuid} AND FC_AD_CODE_NM (TYPE_UUID) = 'Donor'

SELECT ACCESSION_RECORD_UUID as accessionRecordUuid, ACCESSION_RECORD_ETC_UUID as accessionRecordEtcUuid, TYPE_UUID as typeUuid, AUTHORITY_UUID as authorityUuid, NAME as name, TEL as tel, ADDRESS as address, as insertUuid, INSERT_DATE as insertDate, as updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM IG_ACCESSION_RECORD_DETAIL WHERE ACCESSION_RECORD_UUID = #{accessionRecordUuid} AND FC_AD_CODE_NM (TYPE_UUID) = 'Creator'
